query: SELECT userId, isRiding, updatedAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, updatedAt, NOW()) as hours_ago FROM liveLocations WHERE isRiding = true;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT userId, isRiding, updatedAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, updatedAt, NOW()) as hours_ago FROM liveLocations WHERE isRiding = true;
